DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the cardiovascular changes during early postoperative mobilization of hip arthroplasty patients.
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Changes and Changes in Tissue Oxygenation During Early Postoperative Mobilization in Total Hip Arthroplasty (THA) Patients
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 years Primary THA Alcoholism Known orthostatic hypotension Daily use of anxiolytic medication
